markdownRemark.html: It runs along the Atlantic coast of the municipality of San Fernando, and is part of the Natural Park of the Bay of Cádiz . This is one of the longest beaches in Cadiz and has plenty of space for your dog to get some exercise. It used to be a shooting range for the Spanish army and has maintained its semi-wild status.

frontmatter.title: Canine Zone of Playa de Camposoto
frontmatter.description: Canine Zone of Playa de Camposoto  - It runs along the Atlantic coast of the municipality of San Fernando, and is part of the Natural Park of the Bay of Cádiz . This is one of the longest beaches in Cadiz and has plenty of space for your dog to get some exercise. It used to be a shooting range for the Spanish army and has maintained its semi-wild status.
